name: Bennett's Beach Punch
desc: a lovely drink for when you're on a boat. This recipe was meant to be made in the punch jug but it can be adapted.

name: Rum and Coke
desc: A classic drink, made with two great ingredients, which we like a lot and are very good together. I have never had a rum and coke and I don't know the recipe so I just made it up.

name: Oops! all Alcohol
desc: I dont know many recipes so this one isnt real. I'm just going to list a buynch of ingredients and really hope you don't try to mix them together because that might be really bad. Do not drink this recipe.

name: Vodka Mimosa
desc: A regular mimosa except its just vodka instead of champagne.

name: The 5th Drink
desc: It is currently 8:35 AM on Friday, November 12 2021. This drink mixes coke, orange juice and fruit punch for no reason other than those ingredients already exist
